atk-s0402a17:1_4: dve atthe nissāya dve kāraṇāni sandhāya.
atk-s0402a17:1_11: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānanti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṁyeva attabhāve vītikkamapaccayā paṭiladdhabbānaṁ vadhabandhanādidukkhadhammasaṅkhātānaṁ āsavānaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:1_17: Te eva vā dukkhadhammā vajjanīyattā idha vajjāti adhippetā.
atk-s0402a17:1_20: Gihīnaṁ anukampāyāti gihīsu ujjhāyantesu paññattasikkhāpadaṁ gihīnaṁ anukampāya paññattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0402a17:1_21: Pāpicchānaṁ pakkhupacchedāyāti pāpicchā pakkhaṁ nissāya saṅghaṁ bhindeyyunti tesaṁ pakkhupacchedanatthāya.
atk-s0402a17:1_22: Appasannānaṁ pasādāyāti pubbe appasannānampi paṇḍitamanussānaṁ sikkhāpadapaññattisampadaṁ disvā pasāduppattiatthāya.
atk-s0402a17:2_0: 202-230.Pātimokkhaṁ paññattanti bhikkhupātimokkhaṁ bhikkhunipātimokkhanti duvidhaṁ pātimokkhaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:2_4: Pavāraṇā paññattāti cātuddasikā pannarasikāti dve pavāraṇā paññattā.
atk-s0402a17:2_5: Pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṁ paññattanti sāpattikassa bhikkhuno pavāraṇā uttiyā vattamānāya pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:2_6: Tajjanīyakammādīsu bhikkhū vācāsattīhi vitudantānaṁ paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ (cūḷava.
atk-s0402a17:2_8: Bālassa abyattassa seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:2_14: Garukāpattiṁ āpannassa paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsadānaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:2_15: Parivāse antarāpattiṁ āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassanaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:3_1: garudhammūpasampadā ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā dūtena upasampadāti aṭṭhavidhā upasampadā paññattā.
atk-s0402a17:3_2: Ñattikammaṁ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṁ navaṭṭhānikaṁ ñattikammaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:3_3: Ñattidutiyakammaṁ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṁ sattaṭṭhānikameva ñattidutiyakammaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:3_4: Ñatticatutthakammaṁ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṁ sattaṭṭhānikameva ñatticatutthakammaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:3_7: Dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā saṅghasammukhatā puggalasammukhatāti imassa catubbidhassa sammukhībhāvassa vasena sammukhāvinayo paññatto.
atk-s0402a17:3_10: Appaṭiññāya cuditakassa āpattiyā ataraṇatthaṁ paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ paññattaṁ.
atk-s0402a17:3_14: Bhaṇḍanādivasena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ katvā āpattiṁ āpannānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṁ ṭhapetvā
